meanings.definition: A device used to measure the power in watts of an electric circuit.
meanings.sent1: The wattmeter showed how much power was used by the electric circuit.
meanings.sent2: The electrician used a wattmeter to check the power consumption.
meanings.sent3: The wattmeter and the circuit had a chat about electricity usage.
meanings.sent4: The wattmeter was like a detective uncovering the secrets of power.
meanings.sent5: The bright display of the wattmeter made it easy to read the power levels.

meanings.definition: To measure the power in watts of an electric circuit, using a wattmeter.
meanings.sent1: I wattmetered the circuit to ensure it was working efficiently.
meanings.sent2: He will wattmeter the new wiring to check for any issues.
meanings.sent3: The electrician decided to wattmeter the circuit while doing a dance.
meanings.sent4: She wattmetered the power flow like a scientist conducting an experiment.
meanings.sent5: Wattmetering the circuit revealed a hidden problem that needed fixing.
